attributes.additional_details:
A great many people believe that Freemasons (and a female version of freemasons), being 'a society with secrets', manipulate and corrupt our legal system in particular, but also many other fields of administration and business. I believe, therefore, that it would be a good idea to require all persons in the more sensitive fields of work to disclose whether they are or are not a freemason.

Requiring all clubs to list their members would help in this as a masonic lodge can be deemed to be a club. Therefore I think the government should require this too.
